About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

I'm an undergraduate student at Delhi Technological University. I'm pursuing my Bachelor of Technology in Mathematics and Computing. I have immense interest in development. Skilled in C++, Machine Learning, node.js, Deep Learning,Object Oriented Programming, Data Structure and Algorithm.

Expedia Group

Associate Software Developer Intern
18th May 2020 - 10th July 2020

Worked with Content And Media Strategy(CAMS) India Team. I worked on Vrbo's migration of Image content from vrbo to Expedia database .I have successfully implemented the pipeline by building adapter using Reactive Stream ,Kotlin ,Spring boot.

Delhi Technological University

Research Intern
1st June 2019 - 31st July 2019

Worked on Research project aimed to detect malicious Android Apps using the static features of permissions extracted from their manifest files.
